title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server—chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.
highlights: works in browser via CORS proxy

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push, and delete models with a simple API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane for private AI pair-programming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation template using Ollama + ChromaDB to chat with your local documents.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a service provider and Facade to interact with Ollama from PHP artisan commands or controllers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes REST endpoints proxying to Ollama with JWT auth, rate limiting, and OpenAI-compatible routes.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app for Ollama featuring model selector, parameter sliders, and session memory.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio, serde, and native TLS—generate, chat, embed, and manage models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-nuxt
summary: Nuxt 3 module that auto-injects a server API proxy and composables to call Ollama from Vue apps.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM completions inside your notes using Ollama with templated prompts.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models and optional fine-grained ACLs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.
